custom-sql.sql: SELECT * FROM Ram WHERE DATE_PART('day', 'dateInput' - time_)=0
DELETE FROM ram WHERE DATE_PART('day', '[$dateInput$]' - time_)>=[$soNgay$]
DELETE FROM cpu WHERE DATE_PART('day', '[$dateInput$]' - time_)>=[$soNgay$]
DELETE FROM heap WHERE DATE_PART('day', '[$dateInput$]' - time_)>=[$soNgay$]
DELETE FROM nonheap WHERE DATE_PART('day', '[$dateInput$]' - time_)>=[$soNgay$]
DELETE FROM sessionrequest WHERE DATE_PART('day', '[$dateInput$]' - time_)>=[$soNgay$]
DELETE FROM network WHERE DATE_PART('day', '[$dateInput$]' - time_)>=[$soNgay$]
